ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status , 'On Hold'),ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c , 'Waiting for EPS/Engineering'), OR(ISBLANK(VN_Name__c) , ISBLANK( Resolution_Tool__c) ) , RecordTypeId =$Label.TechnicalIssue_RecordTypeID)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the VN Name and Resolution Tool
